Creates an instance of the JDateField class component with the specified date allowing users to specify dates using this date field component in applet/application programs.

fireCalendarEvent

protected void fireCalendarEvent(CalendarEvent ce)
fireCalendarEvent propagates a CalendarEvent object to all CalendarListener objects for this JDateField component.
Parameters:
ce:Ljjb.toolbox.swing.event.CalendarEvent - object containing information about the calendar event which occurred in this date field component as a result of the date changing.

setDate

public void setDate(java.util.Date dte)
setDate sets the JDateField component with the specified date by building a String representation of the date value and calling setText.
Parameters:
dte:Ljava.util.Date - object used to set the contents of this date field component.

setText

public void setText(java.lang.String text)
Overridden setText method sets the calendar to the specified date and then calls super.setText to set the String representation of the date in the date field component. Note that the format of the date should follow: MM/dd/yyyy.
Overrides:
setText in class javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
Parameters:
text:Ljava.lang.String - object representing the date value to set in this date field component.
